## submitBlock

submitBlock {blockHex}; broadcast mine block to network

### Usage

```
qitmeer-cli submitBlock [flags]
```


broadcast mine block to network

{blockHex}: block hex data


### Alias

- submitblock

- Submitblock

### Examples

```

//submitBlock {blockHex}

submitBlock 
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for submitBlock
```

### SEE ALSO

* [qitmeer-cli miner](/en/reference/qitmeer-cli/miner/)
